basic.description: This course includes topics such as intermolecular forces, chemical kinetics, equilibrium, acids and bases, elementary thermodynamics, and electrochemistry.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: General Chemistry II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: CHM 1045  and CHM 1045L or CHM 1050 and CHM 1050L, each with a grade of "C-" or better.
